description: Detects modification of autostart extensibility point (ASEP) in registry.
author: Victor Sergeev
Daniil Yugoslavskiy
Gleb Sukhodolskiy
Timur Zinniatullin
oscd.community
Tim Shelton
frack113 (split)
false_positives: Legitimate software automatically (mostly, during installation) sets up autorun keys for legitimate reason
Legitimate administrator sets up autorun keys for legitimate reason
name: Office Autorun Keys Modification
query: ((winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(/.*\\[Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\[Ww][Oo][Ww]6432[Nn][Oo][Dd][Ee]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Oo][Ff][Ff][Ii][Cc][Ee].*/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Oo][Ff][Ff][Ii][Cc][Ee].*/) AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(/.*\\[Ww][Oo][Rr][Dd]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss].*/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Pp][Oo][Ii][Nn][Tt]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss].*/ OR /.*\\[Oo][Uu][Tt][Ll][Oo][Oo][Kk]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss].*/ OR /.*\\[Oo][Nn][Ee][Nn][Oo][Tt][Ee]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss].*/ OR /.*\\[Ee][Xx][Cc][Ee][Ll]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss].*/ OR /.*\\[Aa][Cc][Cc][Ee][Ss][Ss]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss].*/ OR /.*[Tt][Ee][Ss][Tt]\\[Ss][Pp][Ee][Cc][Ii][Aa][Ll]\\[Pp][Ee][Rr][Ff].*/)) AND (NOT ((winlog.event_data.Details:/\([Ee][Mm][Pp][Tt][Yy]\)/) OR ((process.executable:(/[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\ [Oo][Ff][Ff][Ii][Cc][Ee]\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\ \([Xx]86\)\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\ [Oo][Ff][Ff][Ii][Cc][Ee]\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Mm][Ss][Ii][Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee].*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Rr][Ee][Gg][Ss][Vv][Rr]32\.[Ee][Xx][Ee].*/) AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(/.*\\[Ee][Xx][Cc][Ee][Ll]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss]\\[Aa][Dd][Hh][Oo][Cc][Rr][Ee][Pp][Oo][Rr][Tt][Ii][Nn][Gg][Ee][Xx][Cc][Ee][Ll][Cc][Ll][Ii][Ee][Nn][Tt][Ll][Ii][Bb]\.[Aa][Dd][Hh][Oo][Cc][Rr][Ee][Pp][Oo][Rr][Tt][Ii][Nn][Gg][Ee][Xx][Cc][Ee][Ll][Cc][Ll][Ii][Ee][Nn][Tt][Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn]\.1\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Ee][Xx][Cc][Ee][Ll]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss]\\[Ee][Xx][Cc][Ee][Ll][Pp][Ll][Uu][Gg][Ii][Nn][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll]\.[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Mm][Aa][Pp][Cc][Oo][Nn][Nn][Ee][Cc][Tt]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Ee][Xx][Cc][Ee][Ll]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss]\\[Nn][Aa][Tt][Ii][Vv][Ee][Ss][Hh][Ii][Mm]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Ee][Xx][Cc][Ee][Ll]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss]\\[Nn][Aa][Tt][Ii][Vv][Ee][Ss][Hh][Ii][Mm]\.[Ii][Nn][Qq][Uu][Ii][Rr][Ee][Cc][Oo][Nn][Nn][Ee][Cc][Tt][Oo][Rr]\.1\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Ee][Xx][Cc][Ee][Ll]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss]\\[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Pp][Ii][Vv][Oo][Tt][Ee][Xx][Cc][Ee][Ll][Cc][Ll][Ii][Ee][Nn][Tt][Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn]\.[Nn][Aa][Tt][Ii][Vv][Ee][Ee][Nn][Tt][Rr][Yy]\.1\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Oo][Uu][Tt][Ll][Oo][Oo][Kk]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss]\\[Aa][Cc][Cc][Ee][Ss][Ss][Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn]\.[Dd][Cc]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Oo][Uu][Tt][Ll][Oo][Oo][Kk]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss]\\[Cc][Oo][Ll][Ll][Ee][Aa][Gg][Uu][Ee][Ii][Mm][Pp][Oo][Rr][Tt]\.[Cc][Oo][Ll][Ll][Ee][Aa][Gg][Uu][Ee][Ii][Mm][Pp][Oo][Rr][Tt][Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Oo][Uu][Tt][Ll][Oo][Oo][Kk]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss]\\[Ee][Vv][Ee][Rr][Nn][Oo][Tt][Ee][Cc][Cc]\.[Ee][Vv][Ee][Rr][Nn][Oo][Tt][Ee][Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Aa][Cc][Tt][Cc][Oo][Nn][Nn][Ee][Cc][Tt][Oo][Rr]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Oo][Uu][Tt][Ll][Oo][Oo][Kk]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss]\\[Ee][Vv][Ee][Rr][Nn][Oo][Tt][Ee][Oo][Ll][Rr][Dd]\.[Cc][Oo][Nn][Nn][Ee][Cc][Tt]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Oo][Uu][Tt][Ll][Oo][Oo][Kk]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\.[Vv][Bb][Aa][Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ff][Oo][Rr][Oo][Uu][Tt][Ll][Oo][Oo][Kk]\.1\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Oo][Uu][Tt][Ll][Oo][Oo][Kk]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss]\\[Oo][Cc][Oo][Ff][Ff][Ii][Cc][Ee]\.[Oo][Cc][Ff][Oo][Rr][Mm][Ss]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Oo][Uu][Tt][Ll][Oo][Oo][Kk]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss]\\\\[Oo][Nn][Ee][Nn][Oo][Tt][Ee]\.[Oo][Uu][Tt][Ll][Oo][Oo][Kk][Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn].*/ OR /.*\\[Oo][Uu][Tt][Ll][Oo][Oo][Kk]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss]\\[Oo][Ss][Cc][Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn]\.[Cc][Oo][Nn][Nn][Ee][Cc][Tt]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Oo][Uu][Tt][Ll][Oo][Oo][Kk]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss]\\[Oo][Uu][Tt][Ll][Oo][Oo][Kk][Cc][Hh][Aa][Nn][Gg][Ee][Nn][Oo][Tt][Ii][Ff][Ii][Ee][Rr]\.[Cc][Oo][Nn][Nn][Ee][Cc][Tt]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Oo][Uu][Tt][Ll][Oo][Oo][Kk]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss]\\[Uu][Cc][Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn]\.[Ll][Yy][Nn][Cc][Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn]\.1.*/ OR /.*\\[Oo][Uu][Tt][Ll][Oo][Oo][Kk]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss]\\[Uu][Cc][Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn]\.[Uu][Cc][Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn]\.1.*/ OR /.*\\[Oo][Uu][Tt][Ll][Oo][Oo][Kk]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss]\\[Uu][Mm][Oo][Uu][Tt][Ll][Oo][Oo][Kk][Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn]\.[Ff][Oo][Rr][Mm][Rr][Ee][Gg][Ii][Oo][Nn][Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn]\\.*/))) OR ((process.executable:(/[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\[Cc][Oo][Mm][Mm][Oo][Nn]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\ [Ss][Hh][Aa][Rr][Ee][Dd]\\[Cc][Ll][Ii][Cc][Kk][Tt][Oo][Rr][Uu][Nn]\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\[Cc][Oo][Mm][Mm][Oo][Nn]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\ [Ss][Hh][Aa][Rr][Ee][Dd]\\[Cc][Ll][Ii][Cc][Kk][Tt][Oo][Rr][Uu][Nn]\\[Uu][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Ee][Ss]\\.*/) AND process.executable:/.*\\[Oo][Ff][Ff][Ii][Cc][Ee][Cc][Ll][Ii][Cc][Kk][Tt][Oo][Rr][Uu][Nn]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)) OR ((process.executable:/[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\[Aa][Vv][Gg]\\[Aa][Nn][Tt][Ii][Vv][Ii][Rr][Uu][Ss]\\[Rr][Ee][Gg][Ss][Vv][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:/.*\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Oo][Ff][Ff][Ii][Cc][Ee]\\[Oo][Uu][Tt][Ll][Oo][Oo][Kk]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss]\\[Aa][Nn][Tt][Ii][Vv][Ii][Rr][Uu][Ss]\.[Aa][Ss][Oo][Uu][Tt][Ee][Xx][Tt]\\.*/)))))
